song.title: Zelda Medley
song.info:
1. The Song of Healing 2. Gerudo Valley 3. Saria's Song 4. Song of Storms 5. Zelda's Lulaby 6. Oath to Order 7. Koume and Kotake's theme 8. Sun's Song 9. Termina field theme 10. The Song of Time
More info & download on the page "8-Bit Daily: Derris-Kharlan - Zelda Medley" : [url]http://8bdaily.blogspot.fr/2009/08/derris-kharlan-zelda-medley.html[/url]
